advancements.beam.description: Fire off a beam from the Mystic Staff of Explosive Mahou Condensation
block.mahoutsukai.mahoujin_mystic_staff: Mystic Staff of Explosive Mahou Condensation
item.mahoutsukai.mystic_staff: Mystic Staff of Explosive Mahou Condensation
mahoutsukai.book.alarm_boundary.desc: The Alarm Boundary is perhaps the most basic of boundary magic - it simply alerts you to mobs and players as they enter the range (%%val2) of the boundary. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster every %%val1 second(s). %%n%%nAlarm boundaries will also output a comparator value of 15 when it detects anything in the boundary.
mahoutsukai.book.alchemical_exchange.des: This circle will, once a day around the time of placement, convert blocks underneath it into random other blocks of the same class. For example, dirt may become sand, diamonds may become emeralds, etc. However, this only works on natural blocks, and will not work on things such as bricks or diamond blocks. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster per transformation.
mahoutsukai.book.ascension.desc: This spell, when used without a cloth, will teleport any thing (including items and mobs) on top of it to the highest solid Y value it can find. The scroll version of this spell will simply transport the caster. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster per teleport.
mahoutsukai.book.binding_eyes.desc: When used, eye contact between the caster and any mob or player binds that mob or player in place. Players, however, can escape this binding by simply breaking eye contact. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on use.
mahoutsukai.book.black_flame_eyes.desc: When used, black flames will sprout at the caster's viewing location for a short time. These flames spread somewhat quickly, but do not consume blocks and inflict wither damage to those who come in contact with them. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.borrowed_authority.desc: Borrow the authority of the gods with this scroll, which increases the caster's speed and power, to the extent that mobs hit while using it will break through walls. Hold the jump button to jump further and hold it while in the air to "stick" to the surface you land on. Hold left click while running/jumping to target any enemies you bump into. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.boundaries.desc: Boundaries are a category of AOE spells which operate in a radius around a placed circle, and drain mahou on a fixed basis. You can turn them on and off by right clicking them. A redstone signal will also invert their on/off status. %%n%%nBoundaries give off comparator output - 0 when off, 1 when on. %%n%%nLastly, boundary scrolls can be used to quickly place boundaries in another location.
mahoutsukai.book.butterfly_effect.desc: When this scroll is used, the caster is granted Foresight for a short duration. During this time, breaking/placing a block, or swinging a weapon will be delayed for the future. A butterfly will mark the spot, and things colliding with this butterfly will trigger its effect.%%n%%nWARNING: DO NOT USE ON IMPORTANT BLOCKS.%%n%%nThis spell drains %%val0 mahou from the caster upon use.
mahoutsukai.book.catalyst_exchange.desc: When placed on the floor, this circle will convert any powdered catalysts on top of it into a new random powdered catalyst. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster per transformation.
mahoutsukai.book.categories.desc: Boundaries deal with AOE effects centered on a magic circle.%%n%%nDisplacement spells deal with teleportation magic.%%n%%nProjection spells deal with weapons.%%n%%nExchange spells usually involve a trade of some sort, often to refund or generate mahou.
mahoutsukai.book.chronal_exchange.desc: When placed on the floor, this circle will generate mahou for 12 hours, centered on the time of placement. For the other 12 hours, it will drain mahou from the caster, gems, or mahou circuits. %%n %%nIt will drain or restore up to %%val0 mahou every so often, depending on how far it is from its peak. Note that skipping time will only delay the cycle, instead of skipping it.
mahoutsukai.book.circuits.desc: Mahou Circuits are blocks which store mahou. Mahou in them can be used by the player when nearby, as long as the player owns the block. Whoever right clicks a mahou circuit first after it is placed owns the block. Right click to put mahou in. Shift right click to turn it on or off. Mahou Circuits can be right clicked with Fae Essence to open them to use by other players.
mahoutsukai.book.circuits.name: Mahou Circuits
mahoutsukai.book.clairvoyance.desc: When used, the caster will be able to see the predicted path of certain mobs. Unfortunately, some mobs are an enigma and cannot be predicted accurately, such as skeletons. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on use.
mahoutsukai.book.contract.desc: When two players create their own contract circles, and stand on them nearby, a contract will be formed between the players. Contracts allow players to bypass certain effects such as boundaries and some mystic eyes. To break a contract, one player need only damage the other. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from each player when a contract is formed.
mahoutsukai.book.cup_of_heaven3.desc: For a cup of heaven which grants poison 1 and wither 1, for example, you could simply create a 22-sided polygon and all mobs inside would be affected. %%n %%nMahou cost varies depending on the effects and area covered.
mahoutsukai.book.damage_exchange.desc: When used, the player will convert damage taken into mahou a set number of times (not time-based). %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on use.
mahoutsukai.book.damage_replication.desc: When used on another mob or player, this scroll will replicate damage and potions that affect the caster to the target. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on using the scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.death_collection_eyes.d: When used, the caster collects souls upon seeing death - this death can occur in any way, but the caster does have to be looking at it. If the caster has collected enough souls, their death will be prevented in exchange for souls, whether or not the eyes are active. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.displacement_boundary.d: The Displacement Boundary teleports entities that attempt to enter the range (%%val2) of the boundary to the other side of the boundary. In doing so, it will attempt to displace blocks that would suffocate said entity. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster every %%val1 second(s).
mahoutsukai.book.drain_life_boundary.des: The Boundary of Drain Life slowly drains health from nearby mobs in a range of %%val2. For every health drained, health, hunger, or mahou is restored to the caster, in that order, according to the caster's needs. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster every %%val1 second(s).
mahoutsukai.book.durability_exchange.des: When placed on the floor, this circle will convert the durability of items on top of it into mahou. Alternatively, it can do so from a chest underneath it as well. %%n %%nIt can restore a maximum of %%val0 mahou per second. Note that higher durability items are consumed faster.
mahoutsukai.book.enclosure_boundary.desc: The Enclosure Boundary raises the floor around you to create a makeshift set of walls with radius %%val1. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster for every layer of blocks that it raises.
mahoutsukai.book.equivalent_displacement: An Equivalent Displacement circle on the ground can be linked (by shift-right-clicking) to another equivalent displacement circle anywhere in the world or across dimensions. However, a teleport between the two can only happen if there is something on BOTH circles. That something can be an item or mob, and the chunks must be loaded. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster per teleport.
mahoutsukai.book.explosion_staff.name: Staff of Explosive Mahou Condensation
mahoutsukai.book.explosion_staff2.desc: When in beam mode the staff's damage accelerates the longer the beam is held. Also, the beam will destroy blocks it comes in contact with. %%n %%nThe scroll drains %%val0 mahou from the caster, %%val1 mahou when using the large explosion mode, %%val2 mahou when using the AOE explosion mode, and %%val3 mahou per tick when using the beam mode.
mahoutsukai.book.explosion_staff2.name: Staff of Explosive Mahou Condensation (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.fae_essence.desc: Fae Essence is dropped by the fae. Right clicking with fae essence will place a fae circle. Scrolls and stationary circles created by fae essence can be used by anyone. You can claim a fae circle by right clicking it, and it will drain mahou from you when used. Most importantly, because Fae Essence is not bound to a user, it is ideal for automated scroll creation.
mahoutsukai.book.fallen_down.desc: Give your friends, enemies and acquaintances the burial they deserve! It may be best not to do this near things you care about, though.%%n%%nThis spell costs %%val0 mahou every fifth of a second. Naturally, the longer you channel it, the deeper the grave. Your friends should thank you, really. Note: Flight is a natural counter to this spell.
mahoutsukai.book.familiar_exchange.desc: When used, the caster will switch places with the familiar if it exists. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.familiars_garden.desc: When used while a familiar is active, the familiar will activate its garden. Mobs and players in the garden will not be able to harm each other. The affected area moves with the familiar, and particles are produced to show the area. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.fay_sight_eyes.desc: Very simply, this spell allows the player to see Leylines and the Fae. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.gandr.desc: A primeval curse which gains power based on the user's magical capability. Requiring a percentage of the user's mahou capacity, when fired, this curse scales damage depending on the amount of mahou spent to fire it.%%n%%nFurthermore, this curse will absorb and cleanse any negative effects the user may be experiencing, and spread them around its point of impact.
mahoutsukai.book.geas2.desc: Using it on a named sheep will prevent you from harming that specific sheep. Lastly, using it on a dropped item, will prevent you from picking up that item. Use it without a target to see your current geasa. Creating and removing geasa costs %%val0 mahou each, and having many geasa targeting unnamed mobs will regenerate mahou.
mahoutsukai.book.gems.desc: If you craft an Attuner with a Diamond or Emerald, you can get an attuned gem. These gems will store mahou for you, if you right click while holding the gem. Spells will automatically draw from any gems on your person.
mahoutsukai.book.gravity_boundary.desc: The Gravity Boundary increases the gravity for mobs other than the caster in an area of range %%val2. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster every %%val1 second(s).
mahoutsukai.book.immunity_exchange.desc: This scroll can be used on either the player or something the player is looking at. The target of the scroll will take no damage from repeated damage sources, but will take double damage from a damage source that was different from the last one. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.insight.desc: The Mystic Eyes of Insight allow the user to see more information about a target, such as its inventory, and, in the case of living creatures, their buffs, debuffs, etc. The mahou cost is %%val0 per scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.intro.desc: A mahoutsukai, simply, is a magic user. And congrats! You are one such magic user. %%n%%nLet's first see how to draw a circle in blood. It's easy - just take damage, and quickly use the keybind %%k to draw a circle in blood on the floor. If successful, you'll see a blood circle on the ground, and a mahou bar (Mahou X/Y) somewhere on your screen. Note: there is a dagger to damage yourself, if you prefer.
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku2.desc: When a worm consumes the essence of a mob with a high kodoku value, you can simply right-click to pick it up. Worms with high kodoku values have a number of uses. %%n %%nWhen burned, these worms will generate mahou for any nearby mahou circuits. The amount of mahou depends on how close to a leyline the burning occurred. %%n%%nThese worms can also be used for sympathetic magic.
mahoutsukai.book.leylines.desc: Leylines connect certain points throughout the world. They can only be seen with Mystic Eyes of Fay Sight. Being near a leyline or leypoint increases mahou regeneration based on a percentage of your maximum mahou. %%n%%nThe Fae spawn near leylines.%%n%%nFurthermore, Leylines will boost elytra if you fly along the leyline.
mahoutsukai.book.magic.desc: To perform Magic, we need a few things - mahou, (optionally, depending on the recipe) a cloth, a blood circle, and 3 powdered catalysts. If the recipe is for a scroll, you'd put the cloth down first, and then draw a blood circle on top. Otherwise, simply put the circle on the floor. Take your powdered catalysts and right click the circle to add them to it.
mahoutsukai.book.mana.desc: Using mahou increases your maximum mahou capacity over time - it's like exercising. You will naturally recover some mahou over time, depending on how full your hunger is. Sleeping will regen a good chunk of your mahou, and sleep is important, so sleep often!
mahoutsukai.book.mana.name: Mahou
mahoutsukai.book.mental_displacement.des: A mental displacement scroll allows the caster to temporarily leave his body behind and explore the world in a certain radius. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.morgan.desc: This wicked sword is the result of the corruption of the holy sword Caliburn. Obtained through the murder of a player's best and most loyal friend with the holy sword Caliburn, this sword obtains its power not from a mysterious lake, but from the killing of innocents.%%n%%nVillagers, and more so, child villagers, provide a damage bonus for this sword (requires mahou), and also heal any damage the sword has.
mahoutsukai.book.ordered_displacement.de: An Ordered Displacement circle on the ground teleports any thing on top of it to a nearby Ordered Displacement circle. Which one it teleports you to depends on the order in which you placed the circles. You can sneak to stop teleporting. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster per teleport.
mahoutsukai.book.power_consolidation.des: This circle, when placed on the floor, will spawn a lake. Each growth of the lake costs %%val0 mahou. When the lake has reached full size, the caster can throw in an enchanted sword in order to get Caliburn, a holy sword which will have the damage of the sword plus extra based on its enchantments. (hint: holier is better!) %%n %%nExchanging a sword costs %%val1 mahou.
mahoutsukai.book.presence_concealment.de: A Scroll of Presence Concealment grants the user the two Rippers in exchange for %%val0 mahou. %%n%%nWhen one Ripper is wielded, right clicking will create a thick fog around either the user, or a target the user was looking at. Doing the above with a Ripper in either hand will provide true presence concealment, in addition to the fog, rendering the player and his items invisible.
mahoutsukai.book.probability_alter.desc: Place at least 2 of these circles on the floor within range of the caster, each with a chorus fruit (see config) on top.%%n%%nThe number of nearby circles with chorus fruits when the scroll version of this spell is used becomes the Modulus of the Rule Breaker given by the scroll. This scroll costs %%val0 mahou to use. See Rule Breaker's page for more details.
mahoutsukai.book.projectile_displacement: A Projectile Displacement scroll teleports you to the last arrow you shot. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.projection.desc: The first use of this scroll memorizes a tool or weapon you're looking at (for the whole stack!). The second use gives you a copy of the tool with limited durability. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster each time the scroll is used.
mahoutsukai.book.protective_displacement: Ever wondered what it's like to be an Enderman? The Protective Displacement scroll will randomly teleport you when you would otherwise have been hit by an arrow. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster when used, and provides a set number of teleports - it is not time based.
mahoutsukai.book.proximity_projection.de: Using this scroll grants the caster a weapon, which allows the caster to simultaneously teleport to and attack an entity they can see at long range. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use of the scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.reality_marble.desc: This scroll teleports the user (and optionally, a target the user is looking at) to a fixed spot in the Reality Marble. If the user has a target, one of the two must die for the other to leave. Otherwise, taking damage will allow the player to leave. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.recall_familiar.desc: When used, the player's familiar, if it exists, will be recalled to the player. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on use.
mahoutsukai.book.retribution.desc: A Scroll of Retribution exchanges the health percentage of the caster with the health percentage of the target. It drains mahou based on the difference between the user and target's health. The cost is %%val0 times the difference in health points.
mahoutsukai.book.reversion_eyes.desc: When used, mobs and players in the caster's view will lose their buffs, along with certain other qualities, depending on the mob. Water mobs will no longer breathe underwater - nether mobs will be affected by fire and lava. Endermen, Shulker boxes and the Wither will no longer be immune to arrows. Husks can catch fire in the sun. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.rho_aias.desc: This scroll creates a large shield in front of the caster in the direction it is used. Mobs bounce off of it, and various projectiles are deleted by it. If desired, the caster can also bounce on it by sneaking. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on use.
mahoutsukai.book.rhongomyniad2.desc: Rhongomyniad can be placed using shift right-click, where it assumes its role as a purveyor of punishment. Evil creatures and persons, including those who would do harm to those who are not evil, will be smitten within Rhongomyniad's range, according to Rhongomyniad's current attack damage. This will continually drain %%k mahou. Right click on the placed lance to re-collect it.
mahoutsukai.book.scrying.desc: A Scrying circle on the ground allows the player to see a named mob or player from afar, for a short amount of time. Simply drop a nametag on the circle, and if a mob or player with this name exists, it will be shown with its surroundings. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster per nametag.
Use this scroll to receive a buff. While active, tap the %%k0 keybind to swap places with a target entity. Alternatively, hold the keybind to select two entities, and switch them instead.%%n%%nThere is a short cooldown between swaps. This scroll costs %%val0 mahou.
mahoutsukai.book.shared_vision.desc: When used on a mob or player, the caster will see through its eyes. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
Using this scroll summons a staff which can be used on an entity to launch them in the direction the caster is looking. Longer charge time provides more velocity. Alternatively, when used on a block, nearby entities will be pulled in and launched, after a charge up time. %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use of the scroll, %%val1 mahou when used on an entity, and %%val2 mahou per second when used in AOE mode.
mahoutsukai.book.strengthening.desc: A Strengthening scroll will strengthen the first thing on your hotbar, or your off-hand if you're holding something. Strengthened items are temporarily unbreakable, do more damage, and have increased mining capabilities. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.summon_familiar.desc: When used, the player summons a familiar. This familiar will report on interesting players, mobs, and blocks that it sees, and will chunk load the area around it. You can right click a familiar with a block to make it only report that block if it finds one. Right clicking without a block will reset this. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on use.
mahoutsukai.book.tangible_boundary.desc: The Tangible Boundary is a large invisible barrier with range %%val2 that you can pass through, but mobs, arrows, and other entities cannot. It will not replace solid blocks other than grass, nor will it replace water. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster every %%val1 second(s).
mahoutsukai.book.treasury_projection.des: This scroll give the user a gauntlet which will project weapons and tools from the user's treasury - their inventory, some modded bags, and their ender chest, and fling them at the target block they are looking at. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou on using the scroll, and %%val1 mahou per weapon projected.
mahoutsukai.book.weapon_projectiles.desc: Using this scroll grants the caster a bow, which can shoot tools and weapons. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mahou from the caster on use of the scroll. Shift right click with the bow to use only projected weapons (and projection scrolls).
mahoutsukai.config.alarm_barrier_mana_co: This is the mahou cost per cycle
Alarm Boundary Mahou Cost Per Cycle
mahoutsukai.config.alarm_barrier_mana_cy: This is how often the boundary drains mahou
mahoutsukai.config.alchemical_exchange_m: This is the cost for each block changed by the circle
Alchemical Exchange Mahou Cost (per block changed)
mahoutsukai.config.ascension_scroll_mana: This is the cost of using the scroll (also the cost per teleport if not a scroll)
mahoutsukai.config.attuned_diamond_capac: How much mahou fits into an attuned diamond
mahoutsukai.config.attuned_emerald_capac: How much mahou fits into an attuned emerald
mahoutsukai.config.authority_mana_cost.c: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.black_flame_mana_cost: This is the cost of using the scroll
Mystic Eyes of the Black Flame Mahou Cost
mahoutsukai.config.butterfly_effect_mana: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.caliburn_morgan_mana_: Mahou cost for Smite and Morgan's evil ball
Caliburn Smite and Morgan Ball Mahou Cost
mahoutsukai.config.catalyst_exchange_man: This is the cost for each catalyst exchanged by the circle
Catalyst Exchange Mahou Cost (per catalyst changed)
mahoutsukai.config.chronal_exchange_bloc: This is how often the circle restores or deducts mahou
mahoutsukai.config.chronal_exchange_mana: This is how much mahou is gained or lost every cycle
mahoutsukai.config.clairvoyance_mana_cos: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.contract_mana_cost.co: This is the cost of forming a contract with another player
mahoutsukai.config.creative_ignores_mana: If true, mahou cost of things is ignored in creative mode
mahoutsukai.config.damage_exchange_mana_: This is the cost of using the scroll
This is the how much mahou you get back when you're injured
mahoutsukai.config.damage_replication_ma: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.death_collection_mana: This is the cost of using the scroll
Mystic Eyes of Death Collection Mahou Cost
mahoutsukai.config.death_collection_nega: Souls drain if caster has not enough mahou to support them
mahoutsukai.config.displacement_barrier_: This is the mahou cost per cycle
Displacement Boundary Mahou Cost Per Cycle
This is how often the boundary drains mahou
mahoutsukai.config.drain_life_barrier_ma: This is the mahou cost per cycle
Drain Life Boundary Mahou Cost Per Cycle
This is how often the boundary drains mahou
Drain Life Boundary Mahou Cycle (in seconds)
mahoutsukai.config.durability_exchange_b: This is how often the circle restores mahou
mahoutsukai.config.durability_exchange_e: Take this much durability per mahou point gained
mahoutsukai.config.durability_exchange_m: This is the limit on mahou restored per cycle
mahoutsukai.config.emrys_mana_cost_focus: How much mahou per second drained by Emrys Staff when using focused attack
Staff of Emrys Mahou Per Second
mahoutsukai.config.emrys_mana_cost_passi: How much mahou per second drained by Emrys Staff when using focused attack
Staff of Emrys Mahou Per Zap
mahoutsukai.config.enclosure_barrier_man: This is the mahou cost per cycle
Enclosure Boundary Mahou Cost Per Cycle
mahoutsukai.config.equivalent_displaceme: This is the cost per teleport
Equivalent Displacement Mahou Cost Per Teleport
mahoutsukai.config.fallen_down_beam_mana: Fallen Down Beam Mode Mahou Scaled Damage
mahoutsukai.config.familiars_garden_mana: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.fay_sight_mana_cost.c: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.fay_sight_mana_cost.n: Mystic Eyes of Fay Sight Mahou Cost
mahoutsukai.config.gandr_damage_scales.n: Gandr Damage Scales with Max Mahou
mahoutsukai.config.gandr_mana_scales.nam: Gandr Mahou Cost Scales with Max Mahou
mahoutsukai.config.geas_mana_cost.name: Geas Mahou Cost
mahoutsukai.config.gravity_barrier_mana_: This is the mahou cost per cycle
Gravity Boundary Mahou Cost Per Cycle
This is how often the boundary drains mahou
mahoutsukai.config.heavens_cup_mana_cost: This is multiplied by the square root of the area of the target network, and then multiplied by the sum of potion to get the mahou cost.
mahoutsukai.config.immunity_exchange_man: This is the mahou cost per scroll
mahoutsukai.config.insight_mana_cost.com: The cost of using the scroll.
mahoutsukai.config.ley_affects_mana.comm: Set this to false if you don't like ley lines affecting mahou regen
mahoutsukai.config.ley_affects_mana.name: Leylines Affect Mahou
mahoutsukai.config.ley_flat.comment: Whether the bonus regen is flat or based on max mahou
mahoutsukai.config.ley_punishment.commen: This value is added to mahou regen. It is the floor for mahou added by leylines. By default, you lose 1 mahou from regen for not being near a leyline.
mahoutsukai.config.magic_damage_flat.com: If Magic damages the player, should it be flat damage or based on mahou used
mahoutsukai.config.magic_damage_value.co: If damage is flat, this value is dealt to player's health. If not flat, this value is multiplied by mahou used and rounded up.
mahoutsukai.config.mana_added_scaling_re: Percentage of Max Mahou to Regen Per Tick
mahoutsukai.config.mana_circuit_capacity: How much this circuit can hold
mahoutsukai.config.mana_circuit_magitech: How much this circuit can hold
mahoutsukai.config.mana_circuit_range.co: How far away things can be from a Mahou Circuit to use it
mahoutsukai.config.mana_increase.comment: How much max mahou increases every time it does
mahoutsukai.config.mana_increase.name: Mahou Increase Amount
mahoutsukai.config.mana_increase_log_pun: Apply logarithmic punishment to mahou increase based on current max
mahoutsukai.config.mana_recovery_sleep.c: Percentage of max mahou players get back by sleeping
mahoutsukai.config.mana_regen_per_tick.c: How much mahou players regen per tick
mahoutsukai.config.mana_up_counter.comme: How much mahou is spent before it increases
mahoutsukai.config.mana_up_counter.name: Mahou Up Counter
mahoutsukai.config.marble_mana_cost.comm: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.marble_mana_cost.name: Reality Marble Mahou Cost
mahoutsukai.config.max_mana_cap.comment: How high a player's personal mahou can go
mahoutsukai.config.max_mana_cap.name: Overall Max Mahou Cap
mahoutsukai.config.mental_displacement_m: This is the cost of using the scroll
mahoutsukai.config.mystic_eyes_mana_cost: This is the cost of using the scroll
Mystic Eyes of Binding Mahou Cost
mahoutsukai.config.mystic_staff_aoe_fact: Either a fraction of the max mahou (if scaling) or a flat damage value
mahoutsukai.config.mystic_staff_aoe_mana: This is the cost of using the multiple explosion mode
Mystic Explosion Staff AOE Mahou Cost
